coupon_code.description: The coupon code is optional, if you specify this field, then it will be applied only for those who used it.

effective_in.description: The time where this coupon can be used, null means immediately

expiry.description: The time where this coupon can be stopped, null means never

usage_count.description: The number of times it is allowed to use this coupon, 0 means that is no limit
